scripts.deploy: npm run build && npx gh-pages -d dist
scripts.test: npm run test:prepare && npm run test:compile && node --test --test-isolation=none tests/core/GameState.test.cjs tests/network/NetworkManager.test.cjs tests/network/NetworkConditions.test.cjs tests/network/CollisionSync.test.cjs tests/ui/LobbyUI.test.cjs tests/ui/PersonalBests.test.cjs
